comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: Lovely image.  I know these are in costumes, but I am so used to seeing images of children in the UK from this era and the difference is remarkable in terms of informality.

comment.author: 49625890@N05
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called inside the looking glass, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 19265018@N05
comment._content: I think the date on these photos has been transposed. I'm pretty sure the woman in the background is wearing an outfit and hairstyle from 1920. The little butterfly girl looks like a baby flapper.

comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: I think Alumina Tree is correct there, and would also go some way to explaining the informality of the picture that I originally remarked about.

comment.author: 24469639@N00
comment._content: And a note to the Field Museum - the link to the Urban Landscapes project is no longer working.
